description:
Being an AirBnB host is tons of fun. I've met people from all over, made friends and made good money very easily.

In this course you'll learn everything you need to know to host guests in your home through AirBnB. The first part of the course covers: safety, taxes, marketing your space, adherence to laws and regulations, and a tour of what I do for my guests that made me a Superhost. I also interview another Superhost who does things very differently than I do, so you have a broader view of what it's like to be a host. The second part of the course is a walk through of signing up and listing your space. I show you what I did so you have ideas about what you'll want to do. You're welcome to copy any or none of what is shown as you list your space.

I provide helpful links to AirBnB resources as well as a few assignments to help you be compliant and successful in all areas of your hosting experience.

Hosting is a very easy way to make money and becoming a Superhost will increase the number of people who want to stay in your space. This course will show you how to get there from here.
title: How to become an AirBnB Superhost
